column5: Get out while the perch bite is HOT on Erie.......  Yesterday the 2 of us fished from 8:30am until 11am and we boxed 71 nice large perch.  We were getting them very fast.......many double headers.......so I decided to try out a Gulp Minnow that looked like a Lake Erie Emerald Shiner....never caught a fish on it all while the real minnow kept catching fish.  We caught about 15 or so Gobies and a few throw back perch.......nothing else.  GOOD LUCK and GO FISHING,  BOb

Nice catch...  As for the gulp... As a hook and bait set up gulp is hit and miss... But gulp being jigged...casted... Trolled... Etc where it's a more aggressive method... That's when this stuff shines... Try those gulp minnows on your worm harnesses for walleye... Or on a jig/float for crappies... They do work...really well...
I heard a rumour that Billy Bob actually paid for some bait yesterday  :whistling:
Hey Bob,   Are they moving in shallower now? or are they still in 35-40 FOW?   Thanks  Luke
And it KILLED me to do so........all my bait dipped the day before were DOA when we got to our secret spot.....
Figured that much. Too funny  Sorry Bob

The bait deal told us he just got back from Buffalo and bait is getting hard to find in the N. River.......HUGE LIE I was thinking as he was counting out our bait.....I took only one dip and had twice as much as he sold us for $7.....
